name: Md Karim Miah
details: Morning at 7 AM transfer to Gothkhali 125Kms/3Hrs through beautiful countryside’s and rural bazaar. Arrive at Gothkhali Jetty and board in to the motorized boat.

name: Md Bayazid Hossain
details: The morning after breakfast cruise to Naubanki, Deulbharani – Panchamukhani and numerous creeks and visit Dobanki to experience the Canopy Walk in the Tower and cruise.

name: NH Siam
details: Morning after breakfast experience the village life at Bali followed by a manually oared country boat ride. After Lunch check out of the village camp followed by transfer to Dhaka.
